name: Fire Dynamics
description:
And so, we present you our multiplayer shooter "Fire Dynamics"! At the moment, the game features shooting, wall jumping and dashing, there are also easter eggs when introducing nicknames. It is planned to implement many types of weapons and single player campaign for training.

Inputs:

A - Move left

D - Move right

W - Jump

Tab - Upgrade menu

Escape - Quit menu

Left Mouse Button - Shooting

R - Magazine reload
